My favorite team is Sacramento Kings. I used to enjoy watching Vince Carter play because he was a very exciting slam dunker. In fact, he's considered one of the greatest slam dunker of his time. The Heat came out firing Sunday night in Orlando, building multiple double digit leads throughout the contest. This marks the Lakers’ first loss in this year’s NBA Finals. The Lakers are now 2-1 on the series. The Lakers bench tied a team postseason-high with 53 points, tied for the second-most bench points in an NBA Finals game since starters were first tracked in 1970-71, according to Elias Sports Bureau. It was the 15th occasion this season in which the reserves combined for 50+ points, and the second of the 2020 NBA Playoffs. Sunday’s contest marked the first loss for the Lakers this postseason when making more three-pointers (10-1) or attempting more free throws (8-1) than their opponent. I think you're adventurous like me. I went bungee jumping in Macau twice. The top of Macau Tower is the highest place in Macau. This tower is taller than any buildings in Macau. Immediately before I jumped, I was nervous and a little frightened. All the buildings and hotels including The Parisian Macao looked so short. When I was falling, it was both surreal and absolutely exhilarating. Do you like roller coasters? The most exciting roller coasters are in Fuji-Q Highland in Tokyo. Three of its roller coasters broke the Guinness World Records. The feelings before I did the bungee jumps were different to the feelings before I went on the roller coasters. Right before I rode those roller coasters, I felt absolutely exhilarated whereas right before I made my bungee jump, I felt scared and nervous but of course, bungee jumping was a thrilling experience. Some people are crazy about bungee jumping, whether they bungee-jump off a bridge or out of a helicopter. I'd love to go skydiving one day. It would be a once in a lifetime experience.
